about_the_game:
This is a collection of solo piano pieces that evoke emotions and landscapes.
Perfect for creating the right mood during conversation scenes or any other event where you want to create a truly immersive experience.

*******************************************
Audio: 12 tracks (ogg, m4a)
*******************************************
